name: u3t
description: Monorepo for U3T (u3t.app) - The online multiplayer ultimate tic-tac-toe
author: Chace Stewart

scripts.install-all: (cd common && bun install && bun run build) && (cd client && bun install) && (cd server && bun install) && bun install
scripts.start: (cd client && bun start) & (cd server && bun start)
scripts.build: (cd server && bun run build) & (cd client && bun run build)
scripts.build-all: export NODE_ENV=production && (cd common && bun run build-prod) && (cd server && bun run build-prod) && (cd client && bun run build-prod)
